
# generated by tools/scripts/generate_src_cmakelists.py. DO NOT MODIFY


add_executable(helion
	src/helion/datatype.cpp
	src/helion/text.cpp
	src/helion/ast.cpp
	src/helion/compiler.cpp
	src/helion/module.cpp
	src/helion/tokenizer.cpp
	src/helion/codegen.cpp
	src/helion/ojit_ee.cpp
	src/helion/gc.cpp
	src/helion/method.cpp
	src/helion/parser.cpp
	src/helion/main.cpp
)




target_include_directories(helion PRIVATE ${LLVM_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(helion ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS} helion_llvm -lgc -lgccpp -pthread -lboost_system)

set_target_properties(helion PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME helion)
